text: Nahanni National Park Reserve is a national park reserve in Northwest Territories, Canada. It is about west of Yellowknife. It has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1978.Harper announces expansion of N.W.T. park The park has an area of about . ==References== Category:World Heritage Sites in Canada Category:National parks in Canada Category:Geography of the Northwest Territories Category:1972 establishments in Canada
title: Nahanni National Park Reserve
